name: urological-review-backend
description: Backend server for Urological Review System

scripts.migrate: echo 'Run src/database/schema.sql in Supabase SQL editor or dashboard'
scripts.vercel-build: echo 'Vercel build step - TypeScript compilation handled by Vercel'
scripts.db:reset: echo 'WARNING: This will reset all database data. Run the DROP statements from schema.sql in Supabase SQL editor, then run npm run db:setup'
scripts.db:migrate: echo 'Copy and run the CREATE statements from src/database/schema.sql in your Supabase SQL editor'
scripts.db:backup: echo 'Use Supabase dashboard to create database backups: Dashboard > Settings > Database > Backups'
